### Google Earth Engine (GEE) Applications
::: {.project-meta}
**Role:** Developer | **Timeline:** March 2018 - Present
:::

Advanced satellite imagery analysis and remote sensing applications using Google Earth Engine for agricultural monitoring and biomass estimation.

**Key Features:**
- Satellite-based time-series analysis
- Biomass estimation algorithms
- Agricultural monitoring dashboards
- Cloud-based processing workflows

### PhD Thesis: Spectral Data Analytics
::: {.project-meta}
**Role:** PhD Candidate | **Timeline:** May 2016 - May 2021
:::

*"From field to airborne spectroscopy – advancing spectral data analytics for accurate retrieval of perennial ryegrass biomass and feed quality."*

**Research Contributions:**
- Novel spectroscopy techniques for biomass assessment
- Advanced data analytics for agricultural applications
- Integration of field and airborne sensing methods
- Feed quality prediction algorithms

::: {.project-tags}
[Academic]{.badge .bg-secondary}
[Research]{.badge .bg-info}
[Machine Learning]{.badge .bg-warning}
:::

### Remote Sensing Innovation

:::

::: {.col-md-4}
::: {.research-focus}
